title: WTB T207 Speaker and Wheat Napoleon backs
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTB T207 Speaker and Wheat Napoleon backs
posts.post_content: If you have one you could sell or trade I'd love to hear from you.  Condition not too important but I might pass on extreme beaters or cards with lots of paper loss.

Hey Luke,

Our paths continue to cross (as you well know).  I'm also looking for the Wheat (as well as Carey and Tinker).   Best of Luck with those.

--
Mike
